name: reset-urge
effect: Used on a party Pokémon in battle : Selects another friendly Pokémon at random. Removes all of that Pokémon’s stat changes. This item can only be obtained or used via the Wonder Launcher.
short_effect: Resets a friendly Pokémon’s stat changes.

flavor_text.sun-moon: When used, it restores any stat changes of an ally Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: When used, it restores any stat changes of an ally Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: When used, it restores any stat changes of an ally Pokémon.
